Welcome back
Tune in here Sevilla vs Barcelona Live Score with VAVEL!
How to watch Sevilla vs Barcelona Live Stream on TV and Online?
If you want to watch the game directly via streaming, your options are ESPN Select, fuboTV and ESPN App.
If you want to follow it on internet, VAVEL is your best option!

Key player - Barcelona
Key player - Sevilla
Sevilla vs Barcelona history
In LaLiga...
Looking only at the times they have faced each other in LaLiga, there have been 162 matches, with Barcelona coming out on top with 91 wins, while Sevilla has won 36, with 35 draws.
If we take into account the number of times Sevilla has played Barcelona at home in LaLiga, there have been 81 matches, with Sevilla having the advantage with 30 wins over Barcelona's 28, and 23 draws.
Barcelona
Hansi Flick's team is currently in second place in the table with 19 points so far, thanks to six wins and one draw. The task in this match will be to remain undefeated and regain the lead after Real Madrid's victory.
In four away games in LaLiga, Barcelona has earned 10 points out of a possible 12, thanks to three wins and one draw. Now, it is preparing to visit Sevilla with the intention of securing another victory in the championship, which would allow it to return to the top of the table before the international break for FIFA fixtures.
Sevilla
Mat√≠as Almeyda's team is currently tenth in the table with 10 points so far, the result of three wins, one draw, and three losses. Without a doubt, the aim is to win in order to stay close to the European competition spots.
In three home games in LaLiga, Sevilla has a negative record, as it has yet to win and has only earned one point out of a possible nine, thanks to a draw against Elche. Now, it is preparing to host Barcelona with the intention of achieving another victory in the championship, this time in front of its fans.
The match will be played at the Ramon Sanchez-Pizjuan Stadium
This venue has also been used to host matches in the 1982 World Cup, the final of the UEFA Champions League in the 1985‚Äì86 season, and the final of the UEFA Europa League in the 2021‚Äì22 season.
Hello to all VAVEL readers!
My name is Jhonatan Martinez and I will be your host for this match. We will bring you pre-match analysis, score updates and live news here on VAVEL.
